original_text: As he drew near to the gate of the town, behold, a man who had died was being carried out, the only son of his mother, and she was a widow, and a considerable crowd from the town was with her.
korean_text: 성문에 가까이 이르실 때에 사람들이 한 죽은 자를 메고 나오니 이는 한 어머니의 독자요 그의 어머니는 과부라 그 성의 많은 사람도 그와 함께 나오거늘

sentences.original_text: As he drew near to the gate of the town,
a man who had died was being carried out,
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 한 사람이 메어 나오고 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: the only son of his mother,
and a considerable crowd from the town was with her.
sentences.korean_translation: 성중에서 온 많은 무리가 그녀와 함께 있었다.
